short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Presents a right-click menu with a range of chemistry and protein analysis options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BioChemTools tools calculates a range of protein chemical mass and fragmentation properties. Highlight a chemical formula, protein UniProt identifier or protein primary sequence, right-click and select the corresponding entry from the BioChemTools menu. A new browser tab will open with your calculation results.
